Questions.QuestionText: In terms of your health, how would you best describe the state of your mobility today?
Answers: I have no problems in walking about
I have some problems in walking about

Questions.QuestionText: How do you feel about self-care?
Answers: I have no problems with self care
I have some problems washing or dressing myself
I am unable to wash or dress myself

Questions.QuestionText: What about usual Activities (e.g. work, study, housework, family or leisure activities)
Answers: I have no problems with performing my usual activities
I have some problems with performing my usual activities
I am unable to perform my usual activities

Questions.QuestionText: Do you feel any pain or discomfort?
Answers: I have no pain or discomfort
I have moderate pain or discomfort
I have extreme pain or discomfort

Questions.QuestionText: Are you feeling anxious or depressed?
Answers: I am not anxious or depressed
I am moderately anxious or depressed
I am extremely anxious or depressed
